languages.text: "Годы, что сложились в столетия мы сеяли семена генетического совершенства Предка на этом ковчеге. Теперь же семена взошли — смена поколений породила достаточно чистокровных. Сезон сеяния минул, настал сезон жатвы". {n}Хищный смешок лезвием скользит между лобными долями.{/n} "Предок чует твою слабость — испытания и лишения истощили тебя. Ты лишь добыча для могучего демиурга. Ты уже мертв{mf||а}".

"Year after year for centuries, we sowed the seeds of the Sire's genetic perfection on this ark. Those seeds have now sprouted, and the change of generations has produced sufficient purebreds. The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."
languages.original_text: "Годы, что сложились в столетия мы сеяли семена генетического совершенства Предка на этом ковчеге. Теперь же семена взошли — смена поколений породила достаточно чистокровных. Сезон сеяния минул, настал сезон жатвы". {n}Хищный смешок лезвием скользит между лобными долями.{/n} "Предок чует твою слабость — испытания и лишения истощили тебя. Ты лишь добыча для могучего демиурга. Ты уже мертв{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Year after year, we sowed the seeds of Ancestor's genetic perfection on this ark for many centuries. The seeds have sprouted now, and the change of generations has produced enough purebreds. The sowing season is over, the reaping season has come." {n}A predatory laugh slides blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The ancestor senses your weakness. The trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for the mighty demiurge. You are already dead."

"Year after year, we sowed the seeds of Ancestor's genetic perfection on this ark for many centuries. The seeds have sprouted now, and the change of generations has produced enough purebreds. The sowing season is over, the reaping season has come." {n}A predatory laugh slides blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The ancestor senses your weakness. The trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for the mighty demiurge. You are already dead."

The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."

languages.text: «Año tras año, durante siglos, sembramos las semillas de la perfección genética del Progenitor en esta arca. Las semillas ya han brotado, y el paso de las generaciones ha producido suficientes ejemplares puros. La temporada de siembra ha acabado. Ha llegado la temporada de la siega». {n}Una risa homicida corta como una cuchilla entre tus lóbulos frontales.{/n} «El Progenitor siente tu debilidad. Tus pruebas y dificultades te han agotado. No eres más que una presa para nuestro poderoso creador. Ya estás muert{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Year after year for centuries, we sowed the seeds of the Sire's genetic perfection on this ark. Those seeds have now sprouted, and the change of generations has produced sufficient purebreds. The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."

traits.locale_text: «Año tras año, durante siglos, sembramos las semillas de la perfección genética del Abuelo en esta arca. Las semillas ya han brotado, y el paso de las generaciones ha producido suficientes ejemplares puros. La temporada de siembra ha acabado. Ha llegado la temporada de la siega». {n}Una risa homicida corta como una cuchilla entre tus lóbulos frontales.{/n} «El Abuelo siente tu debilidad. Tus pruebas y dificultades te han agotado. No eres más que una presa para nuestro poderoso creador. Ya estás muert{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: 「何世紀もの間、毎年毎年、私たちはこの箱舟にサイアーの完璧な遺伝子の種を蒔いてきた。その種が今、芽を出し、世代交代によって十分な純血種が生まれた。種まきの季節は終わった。刈り取る季節がやってきたのだ」{n}残虐な笑みが、前頭葉の間を刃物のように切り裂く。{/n}「サイアーはお前の弱さを感じ取っている。試練と苦難で体は疲労しているな。もはや強大な創造主の餌食にすぎない。お前は既に死んでいる」
languages.original_text: "Year after year for centuries, we sowed the seeds of the Sire's genetic perfection on this ark. Those seeds have now sprouted, and the change of generations has produced sufficient purebreds. The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."

traits.locale_text: 「何世紀もの間、毎年毎年、私たちはこの箱舟にグランドファーザーの遺伝子を完璧なものにする種を蒔いてきた。その種が今、芽を出し、世代交代によって十分な純血種が生まれた。種まきの季節は終わった。刈り取る季節がやってきたのだ」{n}残虐な笑みが、前頭葉の間を刃物のように切り裂く。{/n}「グランドファーザーはお前の弱さを感じ取っている。試練と苦難で体は疲労しているな。もはや強大な創造主の餌食にすぎない。お前は既に死んでいる」

languages.text: “几百年来，年复一年，我们在这艘船上播撒族长完美基因的种子。如今，这些种子已经发芽，孕育出了足够多的纯血之人。播种的季节结束了，收割的季节已然到来。”{n}凶残的笑声仿佛利刃一样，在你的脑额叶之间划开。{/n}“族长已经感觉到了你的弱点，你经历的考验与磨难已经让你精疲力尽。你不过是我们伟大造物主的猎物，你已经与死无异。”
languages.original_text: "Year after year for centuries, we sowed the seeds of the Sire's genetic perfection on this ark. Those seeds have now sprouted, and the change of generations has produced sufficient purebreds. The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."

traits.locale_text: “几百年来，年复一年，我们在这艘船上播撒祖父完美基因的种子。如今，这些种子已经发芽，孕育出了足够多的纯血之人。播种的季节结束了，收割的季节已然到来。”{n}凶残的笑声仿佛利刃一样，在你的脑额叶之间划开。{/n}“祖父已经感觉到了你的弱点，你经历的考验与磨难已经让你精疲力尽。你不过是我们伟大造物主的猎物，你已经与死无异。”

languages.text: "Jahr für Jahr, jahrhundertelang, haben wir die Saat der genetischen Perfektion des Schöpfers auf dieser Arche ausgebracht. Diese Saat ist nun aufgegangen, und der Wechsel der Generationen hat ausreichend viele Reingeborene hervorgebracht. Die Zeit der Aussaat ist vorbei. Die Zeit der Ernte ist gekommen." {n}Ein mörderisches Lachen schneidet sich wie eine Klinge zwischen deine Frontallappen.{/n} "Der Schöpfer spürt Eure Schwäche. Eure Prüfungen und Mühen haben Euch erschöpft. Ihr seid nichts als Beute für unseren mächtigen Schöpfer. Ihr seid bereits tot."
languages.original_text: "Year after year for centuries, we sowed the seeds of the Sire's genetic perfection on this ark. Those seeds have now sprouted, and the change of generations has produced sufficient purebreds. The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."

traits.locale_text: "Jahr für Jahr, jahrhundertelang, haben wir die Saat von Großvaters genetischer Perfektion auf dieser Arche ausgestreut. Diese Saat ist nun aufgegangen, und der Wechsel der Generationen hat ausreichend viele Reingeborene hervorgebracht. Die Zeit der Aussaat ist vorbei. Die Zeit der Ernte ist gekommen." {n}Ein mörderisches Lachen schneidet sich wie eine Klinge zwischen deine Frontallappen.{/n} "Großvater spürt Eure Schwäche. Eure Prüfungen und Mühen haben Euch erschöpft. Ihr seid nichts als Beute für unseren mächtigen Schöpfer. Ihr seid bereits tot."

languages.text: « Des siècles durant, nous avons semé les graines de la perfection génétique du Sire sur cette arche. Ces graines ont maintenant germé et les dernières générations ont produit suffisamment d'êtres purs. La saison des semailles est terminée. L'heure de la récolte est venue. » {n}Un rire sanguinaire vient comme taillader vos lobes frontaux.{/n} « Le Sire sent votre faiblesse. Les épreuves et les difficultés que vous avez rencontrées vous ont {mf|épuisé|épuisée}. Vous n'êtes plus qu'une proie pour notre glorieux créateur. Vous êtes déjà {mf|mort|morte}. »
languages.original_text: "Year after year for centuries, we sowed the seeds of the Sire's genetic perfection on this ark. Those seeds have now sprouted, and the change of generations has produced sufficient purebreds. The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."

traits.locale_text: « Des siècles durant, nous avons semé les graines de la perfection génétique du Père sur cette arche. Ces graines ont maintenant germé et les dernières générations ont produit suffisamment d'êtres purs. La saison des semailles est terminée. L'heure de la récolte est venue. » {n}Un rire sanguinaire vient comme taillader vos lobes frontaux.{/n} « Le Père sent votre faiblesse. Les épreuves et les difficultés que vous avez rencontrées vous ont {mf|épuisé|épuisée}. Vous n'êtes plus qu'une proie pour notre glorieux créateur. Vous êtes déjà {mf|mort|morte}. »

languages.text: "Yüzyıllar boyunca Efendi'nin genetik mükemmelliğinin tohumlarını bu gemiye ektik durduk. Bu tohumlar artık filizlendi, nesiller geçtikçe yeterli sayıda safkan verdi. Ekim mevsimi sona erdi. Hasat mevsimi başladı." {n}Ölümcül bir kahkaha, ön loplarının arasını bıçak gibi kesiyor.{/n} "Efendi, zayıflığını sezdi. Çektiğin sıkıntılar ve karşılaştığın zorluklar seni tüketti. Yüce yaratıcımıza av olmaktan kaçamazsın. Çoktan ölüp gittin."
languages.original_text: "Year after year for centuries, we sowed the seeds of the Sire's genetic perfection on this ark. Those seeds have now sprouted, and the change of generations has produced sufficient purebreds. The sowing season is over. The reaping season has come." {n}A murderous laugh cuts blade-like between your frontal lobes.{/n} "The Sire senses your weakness. Your trials and hardships have exhausted you. You are but prey for our mighty creator. You are already dead."
